What is (are) Nonbullous congenital ichthyosiform erythroderma ?,"Nonbullous congenital ichthyosiform erythroderma (NBCIE) is a specific type of ichthyosis mainly affecting the skin. Most infants with NBCIE are born with a tight, shiny cove
